title: Orbital integrals and Ideal class monoids for a Bass order
authors: Sungmun Cho, Jungtaek Hong, Yuchan Lee
abstract:
A Bass order is an order of a number field whose fractional ideals are
generated by two elements. Majority of number fields contain infinitely many
Bass orders. For example, any order of a number field which contains the
maximal order of a subfield with degree 2 or whose discriminant is
4th-power-free in $\mathbb{Z}$, is a Bass order.
  In this paper, we will propose a closed formula for the number of fractional
ideals of a Bass order $R$, up to its invertible ideals, using the conductor of
$R$. We will also explain explicit enumeration of all orders containing $R$.
Our method is based on local global argument and exhaustion argument, by using
orbital integrals for $\mathfrak{gl}_n$ as a mass formula.
